issue.title: Non-deterministic image render/frame publication times between runs

content.raw: Following up here, I backported the pull request with minimal changes to our Gazebo 7 build (the ignition changes were already merged so we are using them by default). After debugging it does indeed seem as though the frames are being published at deterministic times, but unfortunately there is still some other non-determinism in our setup. I'll continue to investigate and let you know if there's anything Gazebo related.
